data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: You may only succeed if you desire succeeding; you may only fail if you do not mind failing.
data.author: Philippos

data.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.quote: Successful and unsuccessful people do not vary greatly in their abilities. They vary in their desires to reach their potential.
data.author: John Maxwell

data.quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
data.author: George Sheehan

data.quote: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
data.author: Pele

data.quote: If you want to succeed as much as you want to breathe, then you will be successful.
data.author: Eric Thomas

data.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get back up.
data.author: Vince Lombardi

data.quote: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: I've failed over and over and over in my life and that is why I succeed.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: There will be doubters, there will be obstacles, there will be mistakes. But, with hard work, there are no limits.
data.author: Michael Phelps

data.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: Action is the foundational key to all success..
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
data.author: Coco Chanel

data.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
data.author: David Brinkley

data.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
data.author: Robert Collier

data.quote: It always seems impossible until itâ€™s done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday.
data.author: Don Marquis
